description: Test cases for Google Maps link extraction. Use these to verify the scraping implementation.
notes: Shortened URLs (maps.app.goo.gl) are expanded and scraped for place name
Place name is extracted from embedded JavaScript data in the HTML response
Addresses come from Nominatim reverse geocoding (not scraping, as Google loads addresses dynamically)
Coordinates are extracted from the expanded URL path

testCases.notes: Famous street market in Notting Hill
